lines.content: I made use of ChatGPT plus to perform majority of the coding for
the tasks in week 2 and week 3.
Specifically, level-7 and level-8 were made using ChatGPT plus,
and A-MoreOOP was made by ChatGPT.
Besides using it to directly code for me, I also made use of it for
additional information such as debugging, okuke.command instructions for
Git, and understanding how some code and software work.
* Main application entry point and runtime loop for OKuke.
* Wires Storage, Parser, and Ui, then runs the REPL until exit.
* Constructs the application, initializing storage, UI, and task list.
* Loads persisted tasks from disk if available.

* Adds a new {@link okuke.task.Todo} to the task list.

* Base type for all executable commands in OKuke.
* Subclasses implement {@link #execute(TaskList, Ui, Storage)} to perform work.
* Executes this command against the given model and UI.
* @param tasks   the in-memory task list to read and/or mutate
* @param ui      the UI used to render output
* @param storage the storage used by mutating commands to persist changes
* @throws Exception if the command encounters a fatal error while executing
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws Exception;
* Indicates whether running this command should terminate the app.
* @return {@code true} if the REPL should exit after this command; otherwise {@code false}
* Persists the current tasks to disk; logs (to stderr) if saving fails.
* Intended for use by mutating commands after state changes.
* @param storage storage instance responsible for saving
protected void saveOrWarn(Storage storage, TaskList tasks) {
* Deletes a task at a given 1-based index.
* @param idx1 the 1-based index of the task to remove
* Removes the task at {@code indexOneBased}, shows a confirmation,
* and saves the updated list to storage.
* @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is invalid
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Exits the application after printing the goodbye message.
* Prints the goodbye message. No persistence is performed.
